verbs.description: royal caribbean unveils price list for [V: revamped] [ARG1: private island perfect day] at cococay royal caribbean has unveiled a price list for its soon - to - be - revamped cococay private island in the bahamas that includes new cabanas that cost up to 1 599 other new features that will come with an extra charge include a giant water park and a zip line caribbean the bahamas price coco beach club cococay 125 acre island island royal caribbean
